sg.edu.smu.ecology

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.smu.ecology.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Quentin ROY on 20/6/16.

    Represent an ecology space dedicated to a same set of functionalities (e.g. an application).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Room(java.lang.String name, Ecology ecology, java.lang.Boolean isReference)
      Creates a new room part of the ecology.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get a data sync object required to sync data across connected devices part of the ecology.

      Get the ecology instance

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room(java.lang.String name,
            Ecology ecology,
            java.lang.Boolean isReference)
        Creates a new room part of the ecology.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the room
        ecology - the ecology this room is part of
        isReference - true when this device is the data sync reference

    • Method Detail

      • getEcology

        public Ecology getEcology()
        Get the ecology instance
        Returns:
        the ecology instance

      • getEventBroadcaster

        public EventBroadcaster getEventBroadcaster(android.content.Context context)
        Get the event broadcaster associated with this room for a given context. Event broadcaster is used to subscribe and unsubscribe ecology events as well as to publish events.
        Parameters:
        context - the context associated with the event broadcaster
        Returns:
        the event broadcaster associated with the room and context.

      • getDataSyncObject

        public DataSync getDataSyncObject()
        Get a data sync object required to sync data across connected devices part of the ecology. If the object was already created, this will return the already created instance.
        Returns:
        the data sync object.
